scripts.start:dev: ng build brickular --watch --configuration development & ng serve dev-app
scripts.start:docs: ng build brickular --watch --configuration development & ng serve brickular-docs
scripts.build:docs:local: ng build brickular && ng build brickular-docs --configuration production --base-href /brickular/
scripts.build:docs: ng build brickular && ng build brickular-docs --configuration production --base-href /brickular/
scripts.preview:docs:sync: mkdir -p dist/local-preview/brickular && rsync -a --delete dist/brickular-docs/browser/ dist/local-preview/brickular/ && rsync -a dist/brickular-docs/browser/ dist/local-preview/
scripts.preview:docs: npm run build:docs:local && npm run preview:docs:sync && npx serve "dist/local-preview" -l 4273 -s
scripts.test:e2e:docs: npm run build:docs:local && npm run preview:docs:sync && playwright test
scripts.release:verify: npm run build:all && npm run test:e2e:docs && npm run check:package-size
scripts.build:all: npm run build:lib && npm run build:dev && npm run build:docs
